files.name: default-data
files.description: Default data pack for Gaia Sky - Contains the Solar System, constellations, NBG, SDSS, meshes and more

files.name: catalog-dr2-default
files.description: Default DR2 catalog - 20%/0.5% parallax relative errors for bright/faint stars - 7.5 million stars

files.name: catalog-dr2-verysmall
files.description: Very small DR2 catalog - 5%/0.5% parallax relative errors for bright/faint stars - 5.1 million stars

files.name: catalog-dr2-small
files.description: Small DR2 catalog - 10%/0.5% parallax relative errors for bright/faint stars - 6.7 million stars

files.name: catalog-dr2-bright
files.description: Bright DR2 catalog - 90% parallax relative errors for bright stars - 7.7 million stars

files.name: catalog-dr2-large
files.description: Large DR2 catalog - 50%/12.5% parallax relative errors for bright/faint stars - 97 million stars

files.name: catalog-dr2-verylarge
files.description: Large DR2 catalog - 90%/90% parallax relative errors for bright/faint stars - 601 million stars

files.name: catalog-dr2-extralarge
files.description: Extra large DR2 catalog - Based on bayesian geometric distances of Bayler-Jones et al. - 1.33 billion stars
